Class TCPDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • TCPRequest
      • TCPDownloader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ManifestDownloader, VideoSegmentDownloader

    public class TCPDownloader
extends TCPRequest
    Download specified file using TCP/IP.

        public TCPDownloader(java.lang.String host,
                     int port,
                     java.lang.String path,
                     int length)
        Construct client socket and the filename of the downloaded file.
        Parameters:
        host - host of VRServer.
        port - port to VRServer.
        path - the path of the downloaded file.
        length - the file size of the downloaded file.
